title: National University of Singapore
content: Bachelor of Engineering (BE), Computer Science. Year-long academic exchange program at NUS.

title: The University of Edinburgh
content:
Bachelor of Engineering (BE), Computer Science. Activities and societies: Basketball, Debate, Chess, Hoppers, CompSoc, MathSoc. 
1. Edinburgh University Basketball W3 – Member of the official university basketball team, competing in Scottish National League, BUCS, and Scottish Student Sports competitions. 
2. Edinburgh University Debates Union – Active member of the second-oldest society at Edinburgh, promoting social and political dialogue. Invited to judge Edinburgh Juniors. 
3. School of Informatics – Executive committee member at Hoppers (gender diversity society in tech), helped organise hackathons and inclusivity events. Member of CompSoc, developed Lean hacking skills. 
4. Edinburgh University Chess Club – Attended weekly meetings, playing with players rated 800–2000.

title: Sri Kumaran Children Home (Kumarans)
content: High School Diploma, PCMC. Activities and societies: Basketball, Debate, Track and Field. Skills gained: Teamwork, SQL, QBasic.

title: The Brigade Schools – Bengaluru
content: All-round academic topper. Activities and societies: Swimming, Basketball, Track and Field. Skills gained: Leadership, Problem Solving.
